Package controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the "UpdateCustomer" view. It handles the business logic for updating a customer in the database.

      public UpdateCustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method for the UpdateCustomer view. This method is called when the view is launched and contains the method for populating the combo box for Countries on the form.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - The resourceBundle for initialize
      url - The url for initialize

    • populateCountries

      public void populateCountries() throws SQLException
      This method populates the combo box for countries. It calls a method from the CountryDAO to create a Country ObservableList for the combo box.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • setCustomer

      public void setCustomer(int customerId, String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, Country country, FirstLevelDivision division)
      This method sets each field of the view from the customer selected by the user. Data of the customer selection is passed into this method and used to set each field.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customerId of the customer to update (uneditedable)
      customerName - The customerName of the customer to update
      address - The address of the customer to update
      postalCode - The postalCode of the customer to update
      phone - The phone of the customer to update
      country - The country of the customer to update; Combo box selection is preselected.
      division - The first level division of the customer to update; Combo box selection is preselected.

    • passCountry

      public void passCountry() throws SQLException
      This method gets the Country that the user selects from the country combo box. The selected country then gets passed to the populateFirstLevelDivisions method.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • populateFirstLevelDivisions

      public void populateFirstLevelDivisions(int countryId) throws SQLException
      This method populates the combo box of First Level Divisions. The method is called after a Country is selected by the user and a database query is made to find the associated First Level Divisions.
      Parameters:
      countryId - This value is used to generate the appropriate list of First Level Divisions.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer() throws SQLException
      This method gets the values from each field of the form and sends it to an UPDATE statement to the database. First, inputCheck is called to check if inputs are filled. Custom confirmation message launches when successful.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toCustomerGUI

      public void toCustomerGUI(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method brings the user back to the customer dashboard.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action when the button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • resetFields

      public void resetFields()
      This method clears all the fields. Setting the form empty gives the option to the user to quickly start over the entry.

    • inputCheck

      public boolean inputCheck()
      This method checks if all fields on the form were completed. Launches an error window if form is not complete.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean of checking if all the fields were completed on the form.
